review: Love my neighborhood Applebee's. This location is clean and recently remodeled. Staff is always friendly, and my order is always accurate when using the carside to go.
I was reminded why I don't go to Applebee's the food is simply fast food with a full bar and flat screens.

Just ordered carside to go and wanted to remove an item from my order and substitute another item. (This is something that I have done for years and never had a problem.) The lady on the phone said that she will have to ask the manager. Then came back with that I couldn't do that because they couldn't account for the food.... So if I wanted fries with my order instead of mashed potatos Â I guess you can't do that either right? What ever happened to customer satisfaction? Is applebees under some new (poor) management?
